raw_body: Beloved husband of Malkanthi (nee) Bakkegoda, darling father of Lester and Lakshani, son of the late Ranjith and Indranie, nephew of Doreen, Nalinie, late Dinshaw, Romaine and Rohan. Cortege leaves residence No. 32, Agaradaguru Mawatha, 2nd Lane, Tudella, Ja-Ela at 2.00 p.m. on Wednesday 22nd November 2023 for interment at General Cemetery, Borella (Methodist Section). 335008
